subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Jamison Olave scored for Real Salt Lake and Dave van den Bergh for the Red Bulls at the new Rio Tinto Stadium in Salt Lake City. Nearly all 20,000 seats in the $110 million stadium were filled.
snippet: Jamison Olave scored for Real Salt Lake and Dave van den Bergh for the Red Bulls at the new Rio Tinto Stadium in Salt Lake City. Nearly all 20,000 seats in the $110 million stadium were filled.
